TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed DragDropHelper extends System.Object
public ref class DragDropHelper abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Represents a helper class to assist dragging and dropping inside the Windows Workflow Designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class abstracts the encoding formats used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> that is passed from the drag source to the target.

Docs.param: The UI element on which the operation happens.
The location of the drag point.
Docs.summary: Allows a UI element to be dragged by a mouse with its left button down over an exposed area of the UI element's client area.
Docs.returns: A value from the enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.
